Posted By: DragonLord132 (9/17/2009 10:55:56 PM)

posts.post_content:
It's a timeshifted card, people. Complain not about the card itself, but that Wizards for whatever reason decided to timeshift a card that no one really likes in the first place.  
  
Though, from my point of view, sea serpents are one of the staples of what Magic has come to be, bad as they are. So, flavor wise, I think this fits well.  
  
  
Still a bad card mechanic wise, though.
posts.html:

Still a bad card mechanic wise, though.
